/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about second reviews of DRB determinations, including
eligibility for a second review of a DRB determination
narrative of a DRB decision on
DD Form 215, Correction to DD Form 214, Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty
favorable DRB determinations
favorable DRB determinations when 38 CFR 3.12(c) is a possible factor
unfavorable DRB decisions
, and
effective date for compensation or pension benefits based on the favorable outcome of a second review of a DRB determination
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B  - Special Topics Involving Character of Discharge
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
